dcterms:creator: D. Yi
Z. Lei
S. Liao
S. Li
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 10,575 subjects and 494,414 face images crawled from the web, used for training face recognition models. The authors synthesized occlusion caused by 9 types of common objects on these faces.
dcterms:title: CASIA-WebFace Dataset

dcterms:creator: G. Huang
M. Ramesh
T. Berg
E. Learned-Miller
dcterms:description: A dataset containing 13,233 face images of 5,749 subjects, collected from the web, used for studying face recognition in unconstrained environments. The authors added 9 types of occlusion to every face in the dataset.
dcterms:title: LFW Dataset (Labeled Faces in the Wild)

dcterms:description: A self-constructed dataset containing face images with real occlusion, consisting of 50 subjects and 1,200 images, each subject having one normal face image and 23 images taken under realistic illumination conditions with various types of occlusions.
dcterms:title: 50OccPeople Dataset
